description: Main entry point for a Flutter mobile application, setting up theming, routing, authentication, and initial screens.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that builds the MaterialApp with theme, routing, and initial home widget.

classes.name: _AuthGate
classes.description: Widget that checks authentication state and directs to either the login page or the rooms list.

classes.name: LoginPage
classes.description: Login screen with form for user authentication.

classes.name: _LoginPageState
classes.description: State management for LoginPage, handles form submission and login logic.

classes.name: _RegisterPageState
classes.description: State management for RegisterPage, handles registration form and logic.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes environment, authentication, and runs the app.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs a ThemeData object with custom color scheme and styles.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp, setting up MaterialApp, theme, and routes.

methods.name: _AuthGate
methods.description: Build method that switches between login and main application based on auth state.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles login form submission, calls AuthService, and navigates upon success.
